text:
NPC Coronavirus Information

The National Press Club has suspended in-person event operations through April 27 in response the current Coronavirus pandemic. More Info
title: NPC Luncheon with Eric Holder

og.title: NPC Luncheon with Eric Holder
og.description: Attorney General Eric Holder delivered remarks on criminal justice and sentencing reform at a National Press Club Speakers luncheon on Feb. 17, 2015.
